Appearance.name: addAuthorNameToInboxNotifications
Appearance.desc: Add the author's name to notifications in the inbox
Appearance.extended_description: If you receive a comment/answer/suggested edit notification, this feature will add the name of the author of the comment/answer/edit to the notification

settings.desc: Show name before contents (e.g. [name]: message) rather than at top (e.g. 'comment by [name]')?

Appearance.name: alignBadgesByClass
Appearance.desc: Align badges by their class on user profile pages

Appearance.name: answerTagsSearch
Appearance.desc: Show tags for the question an answer belongs to on search pages (for better context)
Appearance.extended_description: By default, any search results that are answers do not show its question's tags. This feature adds the question's tags underneath the result.

Appearance.name: colorAnswerer
Appearance.desc: Color answerer's comments
Appearance.extended_description: Highlight the username of a commenter if they have posted an answer on that page.

Appearance.name: displayName
Appearance.desc: Add display name before gravatar in topbar

Appearance.name: dragBounty
Appearance.desc: Make bounty box draggable

Appearance.name: highlightQuestions
Appearance.desc: Change highlighting for questions with favourite tags
Appearance.extended_description: Changes the favourite tag question highlighting to be a more subtle, coloured left-border

Appearance.name: isQuestionHot
Appearance.desc: Add a label on questions which are hot-network questions
Appearance.extended_description: If the question you are currently viewing is HOT, a flame icon is added next to the title

Appearance.name: localTimestamps
Appearance.desc: Convert timestamps to your local time
Appearance.extended_description: Displays timestamps based on your time zone. You can also display time in 12-hour format by checking the option.

Appearance.name: markEmployees
Appearance.desc: Add the SO logo after employee names to make them stand out

Appearance.name: metaChatBlogStackExchangeButton
Appearance.desc: Show meta and chat buttons on hover of a site under the site switcher button

Appearance.name: metaNewQuestionAlert
Appearance.desc: Add a mod diamond to the topbar to alert you of new questions on the site's child-meta

Appearance.name: scrollToTop
Appearance.desc: Add Scroll To Top button
Appearance.extended_description: This feature adds an up arrow at the bottom-right of your screen, that will jump to the top of the page when clicked

Appearance.name: spoilerTip
Appearance.desc: Differentiate spoilers from empty blockquotes

Appearance.name: standOutDupeCloseMigrated
Appearance.desc: Add highlighted tags to closed/on hold/duplicate/migrated questions on question lists
Appearance.extended_description: Adds a coloured box at the end of a title (that replaces the standard [duplicate], etc.) in question lists to more easily tell what the state of a question is

Appearance.name: tabularReviewerStats
Appearance.desc: Display reviewer stats on /review/suggested-edits in table form

Appearance.name: topAnswers
Appearance.desc: Improve answer visibility by listing top answers

Appearance.name: unspoil
Appearance.desc: Add a link to the bottom of a post to reveal all spoilers in a post

Appearance.name: addTimelineAndRevisionLinks
Appearance.desc: Add timeline and revision links to the bottom of each post for quick access to them

Appearance.name: showTagWikiLinkOnTagPopup
Appearance.desc: Add a link to the tag wiki page on the popup that appears when hovering over a tag

Comments.name: autoShowCommentImages
Comments.desc: View linked images (to imgur) in comments inline
Comments.extended_description: This feature will automatically detect comments with links to imgur and will display them inline

Comments.name: commentReplies
Comments.desc: Add reply links to comments for quick replying (without having to type someone's username)

Comments.name: commentShortcuts
Comments.desc: Use Ctrl+I,B,K (to italicise, bolden and add code backticks) in comments

Comments.name: confirmNavigateAway
Comments.desc: Add a confirmation dialog when navigating away on pages whilst still typing a comment

Comments.name: copyCommentsLink
Comments.desc: Copy 'show x more comments' link to the top

Comments.name: moveBounty
Comments.desc: Move the 'start a bounty' link to before the comments

Comments.name: showCommentScores
Comments.desc: Show your comment and comment replies scores in your profile tabs
Comments.extended_description: Adds a button next to comments in your profile's responses/activity tabs that when clicked, show you the score of your comment

Comments.name: hiddenCommentsIndicator
Comments.desc: Add a darker border underneath comments if there are some hidden after it

Comments.name: onlyShowCommentActionsOnHover
Comments.desc: Only show the comment actions (flag/upvote) when hovering over a comment

Editing.name: addSBSBtn
Editing.desc: Add a button to the editor toolbar to start side-by-side editing
Editing.extended_description: An 'SBS' button is added to the right of the markdown editor toolbar. Clicking it will make the markdown and the preview appear side-by-side

settings.desc: Automatically enable SBS on all posts?

Editing.name: editComment
Editing.extended_description: Adds checkboxes to add canned messages for edit revisions when editing. You can make *your own* canned responses by clicking the 'Edit Reasons' button that is added to the Help dropdown menu in the topbar

Editing.name: editReasonTooltip
Editing.desc: Add a tooltip to posts showing the last revision's comment
Editing.extended_description: When a post is edited, the editor is displayed underneath the post. This feature will show what the last revision's comment was as a tooltip when you hover over 'edited' underneath a post in 'edited [date] at [time]'

Editing.name: findAndReplace
Editing.desc: Add a find & replace feature to the markdown editor

Editing.name: kbdAndBullets
Editing.desc: Add KBD and list buttons to editor toolbar
Editing.extended_description: Adds a kbd and bullet icon to the markdown editor toolbar that lets you surround the selected text with KBD tags or listify's the current selection

Editing.name: titleEditDiff
Editing.desc: Make title edits show separately rather than merged in edit suggestions

Editing.name: inlineEditorEverywhere
Editing.extended_description: Enables the inline editor on all sites, even if you don't have 2k rep there yet. Note: this feature may not work on Firefox.

Editing.name: pasteImagesDirectly
Editing.desc: Paste images directly into the post editor without the image dialog

Flags.name: flagOutcomeTime
Flags.desc: Show the flag outcome time when viewing your Flag History

Flags.name: flagPercentages
Flags.desc: Show flagging percentages for each type in the Flag Summary

Flags.name: flagPercentageBar
Flags.desc: Show the total percentage of helpful flags as a coloured bar on the Flag Summary Page

Sidebar.name: hideJustHotMetaPosts
Sidebar.desc: Hide just the 'Hot Meta Posts' sections in the Community Bulletin

Sidebar.name: hideHireMe
Sidebar.desc: Hide the Looking for a Job module

Sidebar.name: hideHotNetworkQuestions
Sidebar.desc: Hide the Hot Network Questions module

Sidebar.name: linkedToFrom
Sidebar.desc: Add an arrow to linked posts in the sidebar to show whether they are linked to or linked from

Sidebar.name: hotNetworkQuestionsFiltering
Sidebar.desc: Filter the hot network questions by their attributes

Chat.name: chatEasyAccess
Chat.desc: Add buttons to user profiles to change user write access directly from a chat room

Chat.name: replyToOwnChatMessages
Chat.desc: Add reply signs to your own chat messages

Voting.name: betterCSS
Voting.desc: Add extra CSS for animation actions on voting and favourite buttons
Voting.extended_description: Pulse effect when hovering over the upvote/downvote/favourite buttons. Currently only implemented natively on Android.SE.

Voting.name: stickyVoteButtons
Voting.desc: Make vote buttons next to posts sticky whilst scrolling on that post

Voting.name: disableVoteButtons
Voting.desc: Disable vote buttons on your own posts and deleted posts, which you cannot vote on

Extras.name: alwaysShowImageUploadLinkBox
Extras.desc: Always show the 'Link from the web' box when uploading an image
Extras.extended_description: Removes the 'you can also provide a link from the web' button when uploading images, and shows the URL input field by default

Extras.name: linkedPostsInline
Extras.desc: Display linked posts inline by clicking on an arrow
Extras.extended_description: Adds a button next to links to posts on the same site that expand to show the post inline

Extras.name: parseCrossSiteLinks
Extras.extended_description: Detects links to other questions on SE sites and converts them to their title

Extras.name: quickAuthorInfo
Extras.desc: Show when the post's author was last seen and whether they are registered

Extras.name: shareLinksPrivacy
Extras.desc: Remove your user ID from the 'share' link
Extras.extended_description: When you click 'share' under a post, this displays a referral link, which incorporates your user ID. This option strips your user ID from the displayed link, preventing inadvertent privacy leaks when disseminating the link via copy-paste. The social-media sharing buttons are unaffected, since the lack of privacy is obvious.

Extras.name: shareLinksMarkdown
Extras.extended_description: When you click 'share' under a post, this will convert the URL given to a markdown-friendly version, with the post name as the link text. This feature also automatically copies the converted string to your clipboard

Extras.name: sortByBountyAmount
Extras.desc: Add an option to filter bounties by their amount

Extras.name: warnNotLoggedIn
Extras.desc: Warn you when you are not logged in

Extras.name: hideCertainQuestions
Extras.desc: Hide on hold, closed, or duplicate questions or deleted answers

Extras.name: showMetaReviewCount
Extras.desc: Add how many reviews are available on Meta to the main site review page

Extras.name: copyCode
Extras.desc: Add a button to code in posts to let you copy it

Extras.name: dailyReviewBar
Extras.desc: Add a progress bar showing how many reviews you have left in the day

Extras.name: openLinksInNewTab
Extras.desc: Open any links to the specified sites in a new tab by default
Extras.extended_description: You need to set the sites yourself by clicking the button next to this feature

settings.desc: Links to open in new tab (comma-separated match patterns)

Extras.name: showQuestionStateInSuggestedEditReviewQueue
Extras.desc: Show question's current state in the suggested edit review queue
